name: Earth Defense Fighter
description:
Earth Defense Fighter
Pilot an experimental space fighter, the one piece of technology that stands between Earth and an endless alien horde. Punch through their ranks and expand the capabilities of your fighter with upgrades to armor and firepower. WARNING!

You cannot "Win" this game. It is an endless shooter. Enjoy!

Features
  • 2D graphics
  • Built in Upgrade system (Exchange levels earned for improvements)
  • High Score tracker
  • Increasing difficulty as time progresses
